-- | A framework for code and document generation for scientific software - System SubPackage
--   
--   Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/JacquesCarette/Drasil#readme</a>
@package drasil-system
@version 0.1.1.0


-- | Define types and functions related to creating a system information
--   database.
module Drasil.System

-- | Data structure for holding all of the requisite information about a
--   system to be used in artifact generation.
data System
[SI] :: (Quantity h, MayHaveUnit h, Concept h, Quantity i, MayHaveUnit i, Concept i, HasUID j, Constrained j) => CI -> String -> SystemKind -> People -> Purpose -> Background -> Scope -> Motivation -> [TheoryModel] -> [GenDefn] -> [DataDefinition] -> [InstanceModel] -> [h] -> [i] -> [j] -> [ConstQDef] -> ChunkDB -> Map UID Reference -> Map UID [UID] -> Map UID [UID] -> System
data SystemKind
Specification :: SystemKind
RunnableSoftware :: SystemKind
Notebook :: SystemKind
Website :: SystemKind
class HasSystem c_a8aE
system :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE System
authors :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE People
background :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE Background
constants :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE [ConstQDef]
dataDefns :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE [DataDefinition]
genDefns :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE [GenDefn]
instModels :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE [InstanceModel]
kind :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE SystemKind
motivation :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE Motivation
programName :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE String
purpose :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE Purpose
refTable :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE (Map UID Reference)
refbyTable :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE (Map UID [UID])
scope :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE Scope
sysName :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE CI
systemdb :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE ChunkDB
theoryModels :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE [TheoryModel]
traceTable :: HasSystem c_a8aE => Lens' c_a8aE (Map UID [UID])
whatsTheBigIdea :: System -> IdeaDict
mkSystem :: (Quantity h, MayHaveUnit h, Concept h, Quantity i, MayHaveUnit i, Concept i, HasUID j, Constrained j) => CI -> SystemKind -> People -> Purpose -> Background -> Scope -> Motivation -> [TheoryModel] -> [GenDefn] -> [DataDefinition] -> [InstanceModel] -> [h] -> [i] -> [j] -> [ConstQDef] -> ChunkDB -> [Reference] -> System

-- | Project Example purpose.
type Purpose = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example background information, used in the <tt>What</tt>
--   section of README.
type Background = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example scope.
type Scope = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example motivation.
type Motivation = [Sentence]
refbyLookup :: UID -> System -> [UID]
traceLookup :: UID -> System -> [UID]
instance Drasil.System.HasSystem Drasil.System.System
